## {.tabset .tabset-pills}

### ggplot2 

```{r, message=FALSE, echo = FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(diamonds[sample(nrow(diamonds), 1000), ], aes(carat, price)) +
  geom_point(alpha = 0.2) +
  geom_smooth() +
  facet_wrap(~cut) + ggtitle("Diamond price by carat and cut")
```
